p: The concentration of caryophyllenyl alcohol, a bicyclic sesquiterpenoid, was 2.1% in the control EO, 0.88–3.17% and 0.54–1.5% in the EO fractions of the ground and nonground materials, respectively ( Table 4; Supplementary Tables S2 and S3). Its highest concentration was in the 20–80 and 80–120 min DT fractions ( Table 4). The concentrations of this constituent in the EO from other hemps in the same region were 0.17–1.19% in new hemp breeding lines [ 29].
